T02D2909:308b-0: @308b * / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2909:308b-1: las kyi mtha' bco brgyad pa'i sgrub thabs sil mar
T02D2909:308b-2: bshad pa la spyi don bzhir shes par bya ste
T02D2909:308b-3: / sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang lha lhag par gnas pa sta gon gyi cho ga dang /
T02D2909:308b-4: las su bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang /
T02D2909:308b-6: bsnyen pa'i cho ga spyir mthun no //
T02D2909:308b-7: lhag par gnas pa sta gon gyi cho ga la lnga ste /
T02D2909:308b-8: so so'i lingga bca' ba dang /
T02D2909:308b-13: las kyi mtha' bco brgyad kyang las bzhir bsdu na zhi ba la lce pog dkar po /
T02D2909:308b-14: rgyas pa la gla rtsi dang ga bur /
T02D2909:308b-15: dbang la tsandan dang gur gum /
T02D2909:308b-16: drag po la gu gul nag po'o //
T02D2909:308b-17: zhi ba la 'o ma can gyi shing /
T02D2909:308b-18: rgyas pa lag gser can gyi shing /
T02D2909:308b-19: dbang la khrag can gyi shing /
T02D2909:308b-20: dar po la dug can gyi shing ngo //
T02D2909:308b-24: sor bcu gnyis pa bya zhing /
T02D2909:308b-32: snying gar so sor gdab po //
T02D2909:308b-34: yungs kar kun gyi gtsor byas te //
T02D2909:308b-35: til dang ske tshe shang tshe dang //
T02D2909:308b-36: yungs kar brab pa'i las dang sbyar ro //
T02D2909:308b-37: lus su bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po dang mthun pa las /
T02D2909:308b-38: gro ga 'am ras sam shing shun las gang 'dod pa'i gzugs dang ming bris te /
T02D2909:308b-39: dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gang yang rung ba'i phur bus 'dzer te bzhag //
T02D2909:308b-40: bzlas pa la bab pa dang /
T02D2909:308b-41: tra ta nas sam gha'i bar du yang snying rtsa sngags so sor sbyar ro //
T02D2909:308b-42: gtor ma'i cho ga yan chad rdzogs nas mjug bsdu ba'i cho ga shes par bya ste /
T02D2909:308b-43: sems can gang zhig skrag par bya ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D2909:308b-44: tra ta dang sbyar te ri mi bdun du blangs te /
T02D2909:308b-45: rdo rje khro bo'i sngags bzlas shing lan brgya rtsa
T02D2909:308b-46: brgyad du gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug cing
T02D2909:308b-47: phur pa snying gar btab ste /
T02D2909:309a-1: b'a r'a na s'i'i sas byugs nas /
T02D2909:309a-2: ri mi rlung chen po la phyar na gang la bya ba de kho na skrag par 'gyur ro //
T02D2909:309a-3: dmag gi dpung gzhil ba ni tro ta dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:309a-4: sbyor ba thams cad gong dang mthun pa las mjug
T02D2909:309a-5: bsdu ba'i cho ga'i dus su ri mo bdun du
T02D2909:309a-6: blangs te lce pog dkar pos bdug//
T02D2909:309a-7: phur pas btab ste brabs nas mi rus kyi phye
T02D2909:309a-8: mas byugs nas 'bi 'bi'i nang du bcug la mchod
T02D2909:309a-9: rten byas te mchod nas skra mtshams su spyi gtsug
T02D2909:309a-10: tu sbas na / dgra bgegs kyi dpung nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2909:309a-11: rigs sngags thams cad gcod pa spho ta dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:309a-12: ri mo la bdug pa dang bral ba'i las byas nas thal chen gyis byugs la /
T02D2909:309a-13: mtshon rnon pos gtubs la dug shing gi mel byad
T02D2909:309a-14: kyi rdzas gnyis dang mar nag tu byas pas sbyin
T02D2909:309a-16: thal ba chu chen por gtor na nges par gzhan gyi dmod pa zhi ba'o //
T02D2909:309a-17: rig sngags thams cad gnon pa ni //
T02D2909:309a-19: thal chen gyis byugs pa yan chad mthun pa las
T02D2909:309a-20: rdzas dang bcas te mchod rten chen po'i 'og tu
T02D2909:309a-21: sbas na / gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad kyi mgo gnon par 'gyur ro //
T02D2909:309a-22: las thams cad 'joms pa ni gh'urnna dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:309a-23: de ni lho phyogs kyi rgyal po stobs ldan gyi rnam smin mi bzad pa ste /
T02D2909:309a-24: bram ze phur bu rig pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2909:309a-25: mdo sde dang gzungs sngags ltar bzlas pa'i rjes la rgyal po'i nad mi bzad pa de thams cad /
T02D2909:309a-26: sarbba bi dy'a ghu rnna m'a ra ya ku ru ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2909:309a-28: bzlas pa'i yon tan de tsam na //
T02D2909:309a-29: bsgrub pa'i yon tan bsams las 'das //
T02D2909:309a-30: rig sngags rgyal po dge bar gsungs //
T02D2909:309a-32: sgrub pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga
T02D2909:309a-33: gzhung ltar byas la bzlas pa'i dus su yang snying
T02D2909:309a-34: dang rtsa sngags la sarbba bidy'a dang ghurnna sbyar ro
T02D2909:309a-35: // 'jug pa dbang ba skur ba dang /
T02D2909:309a-36: mjug gi don bya ba dang /
T02D2909:309a-37: byab pa dang bsrung ba byas nas til nag po'i sdig pa byas te mtshon rnon pos gtubs te /
T02D2909:309a-38: shing gsar pa la sbyin sreg byas pas nges pa kho nar sngon gyi las bcom mo //
T02D2909:309a-39: gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa ni /
T02D2909:309a-40: ghu rnn'a pa ya dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:309a-41: gzhan dag las 'gran sems can gyi ming gang yin pa'i ri mo bris la /
T02D2909:309a-42: dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag ste /
T02D2909:309b-0: cho ga yongs @309b su rdzogs par byas te /
T02D2909:309b-1: ri mo mdun du blangs te bdug pa dang brab pa byas te /
T02D2909:309b-2: ro'i sol bas byugs nas tsher ma can gyi me blangs te sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D2909:309b-3: thal ba rlung chen po la phyar na'o //
T02D2909:309b-4: dgra bgegs brlag par byed na ni /
T02D2909:309b-5: sarbba satva ni la sogs pa ni gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa'o //
T02D2909:309b-6: gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa ni bo dhi dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:309b-7: 'di ni thar par byed pa yin gyi brlag par
T02D2909:309b-8: mi byed de btson ra nas thar pa dang 'dra
T02D2909:309b-10: thar par 'dod pa'i ri mo dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag ste /
T02D2909:309b-11: las thams cad gong ma dang 'dra ba las phur pa dang bcas pa la chas bril ba la /
T02D2909:309b-13: rdo rgod che ba g-yas rdo rje dang bcas pa lus sam mgul du btags na /
T02D2909:309b-14: gdon la sogs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2909:309b-15: 'byung po thams cad 'gugs pa ni pa shyam dbang du bya ba dngos so //
T02D2909:309b-16: rigs sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa ni sam bo dha dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:309b-17: gro ga 'am ras sam shog bu la gang 'dod kyi ming byang bris te /
T02D2909:309b-18: dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhag ste /
T02D2909:309b-19: cho ga rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2909:309b-20: bdug pa dang gdab pa dang /
T02D2909:309b-21: brab pa'i sbyor ba byas te sbyar spos dang dri sna tshogs pas byugs te /
T02D2909:309b-22: tsandan la sogs pa'i shing dri bsung can gyi me
T02D2909:309b-23: lha sbyin sreg byas nas sol ba dang de nyid
T02D2909:309b-25: bza' ba dang byugs pa byas na nges par 'grub po //
T02D2909:309b-26: ma grub pa grub par byed pa ni pra ma dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:309b-27: gang grub par 'dod pa'i ri mo bris la /
T02D2909:309b-28: cho ga gong ma nyid dang mthun no //
T02D2909:309b-29: yang ni ming mgul khug du gzhug go //
T02D2909:309b-30: grub pa chud mi za bar byed pa ni /
T02D2909:309b-31: sam bhra ma dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:309b-32: gang mngon du gyur pa'i nor rdzas kyi ming bris te /
T02D2909:309b-33: dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag la bdug pa
T02D2909:309b-34: dang gdab pa dang brab pa rdzogs pa dang aa
T02D2909:309b-35: shvattha'i khu bas byugs nas za ma tog tu bcug
T02D2909:309b-36: la ras gtsang mas dkris nas phur pa dang bcas
T02D2909:309b-38: sku gzugs sam mchod rten gyis mnan te /
T02D2909:309b-39: shing tu dben pa'i sar bzhag na nges par chud mi za'o //
T02D2909:309b-40: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa ni ku ta dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:309b-42: bu sbyin pa dang nor sbyin pa dang /
T02D2909:310a-2: tshe dang bsod nams sbyin pa'o //
T02D2909:310a-3: bu sbyin pa ni bu 'dod pa'i ming byang bdug gdab brab par bya ste /
T02D2909:310a-4: ga bur la sogs pa'i dris byugs te lung thang dang bo de tse dang bcas te /
T02D2909:310a-5: ser po shing la me gtang sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D2909:310a-6: sol ba 'bru mar dang sbyar te byin na bu med pa bu yod par gyur te /
T02D2909:310a-7: nor dang 'bru 'dod pa la nor dang 'bru'i ming bris la bdug gdab pa bya ste /
T02D2909:310a-9: rgyal po'i dkor mdzod cha tshang gi nor sna tshogs pa tshangs byas na 'grub po //
T02D2909:310a-10: dud 'gro'i ming bris te lcags la bzlas byin na 'grub po //
T02D2909:310a-11: tshe dang bsod nams sbyin par ni bkra shis kyi zhal zas la brten te /
T02D2909:310a-12: a'a yu w'a rdha ne pushtim ku ru ye sv'a h'a dang sbyar ro //
T02D2909:310a-13: de dag thams cad la 'jug cing dbang bskur ba
T02D2909:310a-14: la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor chen po dang mthun
T02D2909:310a-15: no // sems can thams cad bsrung ba ni sam kutta ya dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:310a-19: 'khor dang nor phyugs bsrung ba dang /
T02D2909:310a-22: de dag ni gdams ngag las shes par bya'o //
T02D2909:310a-23: ser ba bsrung ba la spyi'i 'khor lo lus la
T02D2909:310a-24: bcings te so so'i 'khor lo thog tu gzugs pa
T02D2909:310a-25: dang / yang snying rtsa sngags dril te gdong bzlog bya'o//
T02D2909:310a-26: rengs par byed pa ni gha ta dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:310a-27: gang rengs par 'dod pa de'i ming bris te /
T02D2909:310a-28: bdug gdab brab pa yan chad so so'i las kyi
T02D2909:310a-29: bye brag spyir mthun pa las thal chen byugs te
T02D2909:310a-30: shing bsrung ba'i sna ma'i shing dag la me sbar
T02D2909:310a-31: te me tog ker btsugs dang /
T02D2909:310a-33: ril ma la sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba byi
T02D2909:310a-34: ba'i rlud bur blugs te yungs kar dang yungs nag
T02D2909:310a-35: tu sbyar nas gar gtor ba de rengs par byed
T02D2909:310a-36: do // rmugs par byed pa ni sam gha t'a ya dang sbyar te /
T02D2909:310a-37: gang rmugs par 'dod pa'i ming byang bdug gdab brab pa byas nas la chas dril la /
T02D2909:310a-38: rkang 'og dang lce 'og tu bcug na nges pa kho nar rmugs par 'gyur ro //
